titles.title: A bill to amend title 17, United States Code, relating to remedies in copyright infringement actions.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 8/8/1988--Introduced. Amends Federal copyright law to double the statutory damages in infringement actions. Sets forth circumstances under which a court is authorized to award attorney's fees to the prevailing party in an infringement action.
